LanguageData.Blueprint_Building_Helicopter.label: Cargo Pod Transport (blueprint)
LanguageData.Frame_Building_Helicopter.label: Cargo Pod Transport (building)
LanguageData.Frame_Building_Helicopter.description: A launchable sub-orbital cargo pod capable of carrying people, items, or animals. Can be used for sending gifts, transporting people or supplies, surprise attacks, or reinforcing battles.
